title: Natural Sunlight! Super Bright! 3X2 Two Story! W/D! AC! Move in READY!
posting_body: ['Aperture Apartments in San Bruno', '3 bedroom, 2 baths for rent - starting from $4,735 a month!', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'or contact us online', 'This amazing 3 bedrooms 2 bathroom, Move-in ready!', "It's a top-floor unit, facing south-east for tons of natural light.", 'Two-story with a split bedroom floorplan, Living room', 'Working from home?', 'We offer up to 1G Fiber Internet!', 'Luxury Coffee Machine (coffee, lattes, tea, french vanilla).', 'Our 3 Bedrooms are in high demand!', 'Reserve it today!', 'At Aperture, everything is already in place including a vibrant amenity experience and contemporary apartment residences.', 'Our brand new apartments feature:', 'Stainless steel Energy Star appliances', 'Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and range', 'In-home, full size stacked washer and dryer', 'Solid surface quartz counter-tops throughout', 'Full height tile backsplash in kitchen', 'Walk-in showers and vanity mirrors in master baths *', 'High-efficiency central heat and air conditioning', 'Slick window coverings (or similar)', 'Hardwood-style plank flooring throughout living areas', 'Walk-in closets and ample storage space', 'Private balconies and patios scattered throughout the community', 'Downtown location, adjacent to transit, shopping & services including BART, CalTrain & the shops at Tanforan', 'Interactive and multi-functional leasing lounge', 'State-of-the-art fitness center', 'Connected clubhouse with a full kitchen', 'Private courtyard with outdoor kitchen BBQ, fireplaces, and dining areas', 'Digital package lockers with immediate notification', 'Controlled access to community and parking garage', 'Electric vehicle charging stations', 'Bike storage', 'On-site storage units Available', 'For questions about Aperture, or to request a private showing, please call us at', 'show contact info', 'or contact us online and discover your new home at Aperture today.', 'Easy commute to SF/SJ 101/280 South/ North', 'Aperture', '400 San Mateo Avenue', 'San Bruno, CA 94066', 'Leasing Office, Open Monday - Friday 8-5; call or email to schedule an appointment.', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
